feats.adv: You can now also target far away enemies.
feats.chmp: This spell's damage dice increase by one size to d12s.
feats.epic: One battle per day, you can deal half damage on a natural even miss with this spell.

title: Chaos Ray
target: One nearby or far away enemy
hit:
1d8 + Charisma damage.
Natural Even Hit: As a hit, plus another nearby enemy takes half damage.
miss: 1d6 damage to a different nearby enemy.

title: Blarrrrgh!
hit:
3d6 + Charisma damage, and roll a d4 for the effect (same damage for all targets but a separate effect for each one).
1: The target is dazed (save ends).
2: The target is weakened (save ends).
3: The target is hampered until the end of your next turn.
4: The target is confused until the end of your next turn.
